title: Looking to trade Old Judge Ned Hanlon for t202 Cobb or Speaker
author: milkit1

posts.post_title: Looking to trade Old Judge Ned Hanlon for t202 Cobb or Speaker
posts.post_content:
Have a nice PSA authentic n172 Ned Hanlon that I am looking to trade for a cobb/o'leary T202 or a Speaker/wood T202
Would also consider for a m116 Tinker and Brown
